name: FSDR Filesystem Data Recovery
short_description: FSDR  is a free, cross-platform software. When the user  delete some important information in his file system ，it will do its utmost to restore the user's loss. It will support ext3/ext2, fat, ufs, jifs and other file system data recovery.
